course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Advanced Digital Design
course.description: This course will provide an in-depth study of various digital design and computer graphics algorithms and software. Topics include spline surface, transformations, hierarchical modelling, computer animation, particle systems, cloth simulation, ray tracing, shading, texture mapping, antialiasing, global illumination, collision detection, rasterization, virtual and augmented reality (VR and AR).Advanced topics and latest research works will also be covered.
